etomica.potential

Interface Potential1.Intramolecular

  • Enclosing class:
    Potential1

    public static interface Potential1.Intramolecular
    Marker interface indicating that a one-body potential is an intramolecular potential, and not, e.g., a potential of interaction with an external field. This is useful when computing energy changes for molecule translations and rotations, for which intramolecular contributions can be ignored.
